mapper.select: SELECT a.sku_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY sale_attr_value_id ASC SEPARATOR '|') AS value_json FROM (SELECT si.id sku_id, ssav2.id vid, ssav2.spu_id, ssav2.sale_attr_value_id, ssav.base_sale_attr_id FROM sku_info si LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value ssav2 ON si.id = ssav2.sku_id LEFT JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssav2.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id WHERE si.spu_id = #{spuId} ORDER BY si.id, ssav.base_sale_attr_id, ssav2.sale_attr_value_id) a GROUP BY a.sku_id
